title: FPV Drone Propeller
description: Schema for an FPV drone propeller, covering diameter, pitch, blade count, material, and shaft compatibility.

id.description: Unique identifier for the propeller, typically a UUID or slug.

manufacturer.description: Name of the propeller manufacturer (e.g., HQProp, Gemfan, DAL).

model.description: Model name of the propeller (e.g., Ethix S5, 51466 V2).

diameter_inches.description: Propeller diameter in inches. Common FPV sizes: 3, 3.5, 5, 7.

pitch_inches.description: Propeller pitch in inches. Represents the theoretical forward distance per revolution. Higher pitch yields more speed but draws more current.

blade_count.description: Number of blades on the propeller. Common values: 2 (bi-blade), 3 (tri-blade), 4 (quad-blade).

material.description: Primary material of the propeller. 'pc' is standard polycarbonate; 'pc_glass' is glass-fiber reinforced polycarbonate for added stiffness; 'carbon' is carbon fiber composite.

shaft_type.description: Motor shaft mounting type. Must match the motor shaft type for compatibility.

weight_g.description: Weight of a single propeller in grams.

price_usd.description: Price in US dollars per set (typically 4 propellers: 2 CW and 2 CCW).
